voice_info.appearance: You see Romero.
sample_lines: Stand down!
I ask the questions here. What are you doing here?
You must be one of those wimpy little purple robes. Get out of here before we blow you away.

npc_lines.text: Stand down!
I ask the questions here. What are you doing here?
You must be one of those wimpy little purple robes. Get out of here before we blow you away.
Hmm. If you are really from Adytum, then you are still a loser. There can never be peace while those Rippers are still around.
Hey, now that you are a Blade, I need to ask you a favor.
It seems that I have fallen for a girl in Adytum. Because of the Regulators shooting us on sight, I can't get close to her.
If you take this locket to Julianna, I would be in your debt.
I think she loves me too, but I don't know. The Blades won't risk letting me try to break into Adytum.

voice_info.appearance: You see Rutger.
sample_lines: Hello and welcome to the Far Go Traders. How may we help you?
Well, we 'can' transport water, but it will cost you. How much do you need and where is it going?
A whole vault? Are you nuts? We don't have that kind of access to that much water. Plus, I wouldn't want to go into those mountains. We've had enough missing caravans.

npc_lines.text: Hello and welcome to the Far Go Traders. How may we help you?
Well, we 'can' transport water, but it will cost you. How much do you need and where is it going?
A whole vault? Are you nuts? We don't have that kind of access to that much water. Plus, I wouldn't want to go into those mountains. We've had enough missing caravans.
Oh sorry, you're not from around here. The Water Merchants handle all the damn water in this town. I wouldn't even bother trying to deal with them. They're a bunch of vultures.
You can't miss them. They're south of here, all barricaded in with that damn water tower.
I'm in charge of the...I mean, I help run the Far Go Traders. If anyone messes with us, I'm the one they will answer to. We trade wares between all the different settlements.
I already told you.  Butch and I run the Far Go Traders.  Now what did you want?
Why, we trade just about everything you can think of: chems, tires, guns, bullets, food, brahmin, dirt, even scraps of metal.
You'd be surprised at what's in demand out there. Something that's taken for granted in one place may be a highly sought after commodity in a settlement 10 miles away.
I don't think I want a child killer on one of my caravans.
I thought you didn't want the job. What do you want?
How goes the search?

The job pays 500 Hubbucks when you can tell Butch exactly what has been happening to all of the caravans that have disappeared recently. So, collect any proof you might find. I personally think it's those damn Water Merchants or those gun freaks at the Brotherhood of Steel. Butch thinks it's some Claw of death or something. Check with Beth, she would know more about that.
I thought for sure you were from there. I was just testing you. If you're not from there, how the hell did you get that suit of steel they all traipse around in?

Damn, you must be good. I'm glad you're on our side. I don't know how you couldn't know, but the Brotherhood is a strange bunch that worship technology, or something like that.  They're just a little to the northwest from here.
Well, whatever. I'm sure you've met them before. They're a strange bunch that worship technology or something like that. They're to the northwest of here.
They are really strange. They worship technology or something like that. They have a hell of a lot of fire power. They could easily take out a caravan. They're to the northwest.
I knew you had to be one of them. You had to be with that steel suit. I hope you're right, and I hope it's not a mistake hiring you, but you're not the only one we've hired so, it's ok.
Why do you say that?
Well, that's reassuring. I think.
I hope you're right.
A hunch isn't good enough. We need proof.
Beth's right out that door and to the right. She runs our weapon shop. Tell her you're working for us, and you'll get a 15% discount.

Oh, yeah, Deathclaw, whatever. They're all crazy. It's just people's imagination getting carried away. There's no ghost or monster or whatever it's supposed to be. Just stick with reality, and you'll be fine.
Yes? How can I help you?
Really? So, who are the bastards? The Water Merchants?
I knew it was them. Did you bring proof? I'm going to make those bastards pay.
What? How? That's impossible. You're gotta be joking? You are joking, aren't you?
Some huge mutants are destroying my caravans? That's almost as good as this Deathclaw story.
Please, don't add to Butch's paranoia. He's a little bit touchy when it comes to the Deathclaw. Now tell me, did you actually find anything out? Was it the Water Merchants?
Rats, huh? So, did you find anything out or what? It's those damn Water Merchants, I know it!
Mutants destroyed our caravans? That's almost as good as the one about the Deathclaw.
So, do you have any proof about who's been messing with my, I mean, our caravans?
Hi. How may I help you?
Hey! I heard you killed the bastard in charge of those mutants. Good going. You probably saved the lives of everyone in the Hub; but I wonder where they were coming from.
Hey there, buddy. How are things going?
Hey there, gorgeous. How are things going?
How's my favorite lady?
Hey, I heard you destroyed some base where all those damn mutants were hanging out! Good job! Too bad you couldn't track down their leader.
Sure, we could use you in one of our caravans.  Do you do guard work? The pays standard, 400 hubbucks. Interested?
What?  What about the missing caravans?
I dont think that will be very affective, but you can work on one if you like.

Well sure, we may be losing a lot of caravans, but it is a very small percentage of our total business. The chances of you being on a caravan that is attacked by whatever is completely capturing or destroying our caravans is very unlikely.  Who or what ever is doing this must have a pretty large force, or a very deadly one.
Hello again.  What can I do you for I mean do for you?

voice_info.appearance: You see Sammael, one of the Scavs from Adytum.
sample_lines: Hey, I don't believe we've met. You are?
The pleasure's mine. I'm called Sammael.
I'm a Scav -- a scavenger. My job is to search out all of the Boneyard for useful items and information. Dangerous work.

npc_lines.text: Hey, I don't believe we've met. You are?
The pleasure's mine. I'm called Sammael.
I'm a Scav -- a scavenger. My job is to search out all of the Boneyard for useful items and information. Dangerous work.
Well, you got the DeathClaws out there, and then you got the Regulators back here in Adytum.  Both ain't the most forgiving types.
I've done a little scouting. Who do you want to know about?
Heya. We see each other once more. What's up?

voice_info.appearance: Oh, my god! You killed him!
sample_lines: Oh, my god! You killed him!
He was my lover. He was my best friend. I can't believe that you did that to him.
He was a human being. The only way he could survive was by being dipped. You killed him.

npc_lines.text: Oh, my god! You killed him!
He was my lover. He was my best friend. I can't believe that you did that to him.
He was a human being. The only way he could survive was by being dipped. You killed him.
What are you doing out of your protective cell?

You should be in your cell. The guards are keeping us here for our protection. The robots have been programmed to attack unescorted normals. Once I've been dipped, I'll be able to spend time helping the Unity.
Of course, it's the best chance humanity has to survive.

voice_info.appearance: You see Saal, the boxer.
sample_lines: What do you want?
Yes?
[Saal laughs heartily.] Why, I am a boxer!

npc_lines.text: What do you want?
Yes?
[Saal laughs heartily.] Why, I am a boxer!
Well, you're in the right place if you're looking for someone to pound that ugly mug of yours into a better shape.
I'm Saal.
Yes.
I've been here all my life. Grew up here.
Hmm. Well, stranger, I work for Gizmo. He's the owner of that great casino there. Pays good money to fighters here, too! What else do you want to know?
Been boxing for a few years.

I was always getting into scuffles with my brothers when I grew up. One time a small band of raiders attacked Junktown, and I beat one into submission before he could get his gun on me. Just luck, really, but Gizmo was sponsoring organized fights, and I needed some money. Been boxing ever since.

If you are just looking for supplies, you should try Killian Darkwater's store, off southeast of here. You can also get a night's sleep at the Crash House near here. If you are planning to stay a while, you might want to get a drink over at the Skum Pitt, but watch out for the Skulz.
Gizmo's casino is where everybody goes to gamble. There are many games and you can have a great time! It's the best place this side of the Hub!

My brother James was killed in a raider attack a few years ago. Shortly after that, my other brother, Darrell, gathered together some things and set off south towards a mythical place called the Glow, in search of the treasure of the ancients, or something like that. He never came back.
Thank you. It's been a few years, but I still don't like to talk about it much.
I live here. I like boxing, I have a good life with Trish, and I have no desire to go elsewhere.
Well, what?
What can I help you with?
The Skulz are a bad bunch who hang out in the back of the Crash House and at the Skum Pitt. Watch out for them; they like playing with knives.
Well, be sure to keep your hands off, eh?
Ah, she just doesn't like boxing, is all.
You again. What now?
Hello again.

From what I've heard, the Glow is a great crater that glows at night. It's supposed to be far, far to the south, but I don't know where. Stories say that it's inhabited by all sorts of mutant freaks who guard the technology from before the War.

voice_info.appearance: You see a scout for the Nightkin.
sample_lines: What have we here? A normal. I think you will come with me.
It is really quite simple. If you come with me, I can help you.

npc_lines.text: What have we here? A normal. I think you will come with me.
It is really quite simple. If you come with me, I can help you.

voice_info.appearance: You see Seth, leader of the guards of Shady Sands.
sample_lines: Not very bright, eh? Well, watch out for the Radscorpions, and stay out of trouble.
You look like one of those raiders. We keep a close watch here in Shady Sands. What do you want?
Good day. I am called Seth. How can I help you?

npc_lines.text: Not very bright, eh? Well, watch out for the Radscorpions, and stay out of trouble.
You look like one of those raiders. We keep a close watch here in Shady Sands. What do you want?
Good day. I am called Seth. How can I help you?
Information? What do you want to know about?
What can I do for you?
What do you want now?

Those damn Radscorpions have been after our Brahmin since we moved here. Not a week goes by that someone doesn't get poisoned trying to keep them out of the pens. Last week they took my brother Jarvis. Razlo, our doctor, is looking for an antidote as quickly as he can. Hey, if you have the means to help us, why don't you talk to our leader, Aradesh.
There are several groups of raiders. I organize guards like Ian to help fight them off. There is one band to the southeast of here. Watch out for them.
Shady Sands is a peaceful community. We have our own irrigation system, so we can grow our own food. If we were not plagued with raiders and Radscorpions, we would have no problems.
Are you sure you want me to give you directions to the Radscorpion caves?  I can't go, but I can show you the way.
Thanks to you, we are now safe from them.
Are you sure you want to return there? It is a long journey, and you have removed the threat of them.
Thank Dharma you're here wanderer. My girl . . . uh, Tandi, Aradesh's daughter, has been kidnapped. We believe the raiders have her.
Where's Tandi? Why haven't you rescued her?
They're to the southeast. Please, hurry. I don't know what they'll do to her.
I knew you were a heartless mercenary. We'll pay you well for saving her, rest assured.
I wish you'd save Tandi first, stranger, but, if you're willing to help us with the radscorpions, I guess I'll show you the way.

voice_info.appearance: You see Shark.
sample_lines: Hey, fresh bait! So, what brings you in to our territory, chum? Here for a little fun? At your expense, of course.
Well, for this evening's entertainment, we've decided to thrash this place! Heh. Grab what you can carry and let's see some blood run, eh?
You again? Geez, some people just don't learn!

npc_lines.text: Hey, fresh bait! So, what brings you in to our territory, chum? Here for a little fun? At your expense, of course.
Well, for this evening's entertainment, we've decided to thrash this place! Heh. Grab what you can carry and let's see some blood run, eh?
You again? Geez, some people just don't learn!

voice_info.appearance: You see Sherry.
sample_lines: Who are you and what are you doing here?
Apparently so, since everyone knows that this is the territory of the Skulz. You'd better beat it before someone decides to hurt you.
Take off, you hoser, before one of us decides to tear you up.

npc_lines.text: Who are you and what are you doing here?
Apparently so, since everyone knows that this is the territory of the Skulz. You'd better beat it before someone decides to hurt you.
Take off, you hoser, before one of us decides to tear you up.
That's us! We're the meanest gang in town. Actually, we're the only gang. But nobody messes with us.
Oh. Well, you'd better not. I mean, you're not one of the Skulz, and this is our place. So, you should get lost, before Victor gets itchy.
Victor's right over there. He's the meanest of us all. He likes torturing iguanas that he catches. I don't really like him, to tell the truth, but he's one of us.
Well, there's Victor, and Shark, who hangs out at the Skum Pitt. Vinnie, too, and a couple other guys who stop by from time to time.
Oh, the Skum Pitt is a sleazy bar north of here, near Gizmo's casino.
You bet! Nobody messes with us! Well, except for Killian, but he's cool and all. He's like the sheriff man. We do whatever we want.

We just hang out, and sometimes we play games at Gizmo's or have some fun over at the Skum Pitt. Sometimes we do odd jobs for Gizmo or for some traveler. Victor likes stalking people, too. Come to think of it, you might want to stay away from him.

We're like a family! We take care of each other. Well, except for Shark, who's always breaking things. And Victor, who looks at people funny. But Vinnie is cool. And we do stuff together. You know, we're like friends and stuff.
Oh, it's you again! You know, it's probably not healthy to hang out here if you're not one of the Skulz. And you're not.
Not too much, actually. There's not much to do. I mean, Shark has been causing some fights at the Skum Pitt, as usual, but what else is there to do around here?
Well, I do sort of like to draw. And Vinnie says I'm a pretty good cook. But I mean, hey, we have fun and stuff, you know?
Um, well, I never gave it much thought. I mean, Vinnie and Victor make some money and Shark occasionally does some bodyguarding for visitors here. I don't know.
Hi! How are you doing? It's been a while.
I'm sorry to hear that! Perhaps you should get a room and sleep it off. Talk to Marcelles. Oh, and here, I can fix you something to eat, if you like.

He's this huge fat guy who runs the Casino. He wants to run Junktown, but Killian keeps him in line. He pays pretty well, though. Occasionally he hires Vinnie or Victor to deal with people for him, if they've been a problem, like one stranger who showed up here a few weeks ago.
You want me to turn in my friends?!?

voice_info.appearance: You see Sinthia, the seductive sellbaby.
sample_lines: Hey, darling, how you doing?
Maybe I can help you with that.
Thank you for what you did. No one ever took care of me like that before.

npc_lines.text: Hey, darling, how you doing?
Maybe I can help you with that.
Thank you for what you did. No one ever took care of me like that before.
I mean, my boss didn't even send some of his goons to help. You'd think for all the cash I make for that loser, he would at least live up to his part of the bargain.

Gizmo, of course. He runs all the sin in this town. Killian sure as hell wouldn't put up with me or my kind. If it wasn't for the fact that I make Giz a whole hell of a lot of money, I'd have to do other things to him.
And, honey, those thoughts just don't do my stomach a whole lot of good.
You're telling me. But what else can I do? It seems like my life has been designed by someone else. Oh, well. A girl has to make a living.
But sugar, this one's for free.
Why, honey, I take care of men, and they take care of me in return. Gizmo gets 25% and I supposedly get his protection. You saw how well that went, huh?"
You shit! You killed him! Why did you have to kill him? You bastard! I can't believe you killed him. All he wanted was someone to talk to. You don't care about human life, do you?
You shit! You killed him! Why did you have to kill him? You bitch! I can't believe you killed him. All he wanted was someone to talk to. You don't care about human life, do you?
You killed him! I can't believe you killed him. All he wanted was someone to talk to . . .
Oh, sorry. I though he was dead. I though you killed him. He's not such a bad guy, after all. Just a little lonely.
You again. What can I help you with this time?
What do you want to know, but make it short, honey, I'm on the clock.
Hmm. I know about eight, personally, if you get my meaning. I think he has another ten or so.

Money? How would I know? He only takes my money, he doesn't show me his. I would guess that it's in his bedroom, but for all I know, he could keep it where the sun doesn't shine. And for Giz, that's a big place.

Only that he thinks he doesn't have any. Well, that and he's a fat slob, who can't move for a damn. He's got to have his guards help him move around. Even then, they gotta use a little tricycle. Heh heh.

voice_info.appearance: You see Slappy.
sample_lines: Oooh, pretty, pretty stuff.  Why is the moon?
All bright, it's all bright, the bright comes down, and then we are doomed.
Deathclaw, Deathclaw, Dah Dah Deathclaw.

npc_lines.text: Oooh, pretty, pretty stuff.  Why is the moon?
All bright, it's all bright, the bright comes down, and then we are doomed.
Deathclaw, Deathclaw, Dah Dah Deathclaw.
Do, I, do, then you do, then we all do.
Problems are like Soup Bowls, wide and shallow.
Deathclaw scary, really scary.  Looks neat though.  Wanna' see it?
Yeah, Deathclaw, Deathclaw, going to see the Deathclaw.
I do this, then I do that.  You see Harold?  Harold's fun, his hair falls out, falls in the wind.  There it goes... wind, wind.
Beth, Beth, shoo sha Beth.  Like Harold, you talk Harold.  Harold tell you story.  Slappy help then.

voice_info.appearance: You see a zombie.
sample_lines: Hello my child. Why do you hold a weapon? Perhaps you need instruction in the ways of peace?
Hello. Nice weather, isn't it?
Hello friend. It is good to see you. Put down your weapon, you are among friends here!

npc_lines.text: Hello my child. Why do you hold a weapon? Perhaps you need instruction in the ways of peace?
Hello. Nice weather, isn't it?
Hello friend. It is good to see you. Put down your weapon, you are among friends here!
Hello stranger. Forgive me, but you should not draw your weapon in the Cathedral.
Hello stranger. If you have come here to be redeemed, you are welcome here, but I would suggest you put away your weapon.
Hello friend! I'm so glad to see you've joined our cause!
Hello stranger. May I help you?
Hail the Master! Hail Peace! Hail the Holy Flame! Hail Unity!
But we have no guards, except for the Nightkin. What are you talking about?
I do not believe we have any. Praise the Master, I'm sure this is for the best.
Many have tried to kill the Master, and all have failed. However, if you attempt this vile act, the Master may forgive you and find a good use for you. I shall pray for you.
I hear that our Crusade goes well. Soon we shall bring Peace and Unity to the Boneyard, and all the surrounding communities  Isn't it great?
The person that you seek is Father Morpheus. He can be found in the tower. Is that all?
Is there something else on your mind, my child?
You have a very good sense of humor, my child. Just don't tell jokes to Brother Lasher.

Have you never been to the Cathedral before? This is a place of Peace and Unity. This is a place where differences are forgotten and we seek a future of unity and prosperity for all. A future where the horrors that our ancestors inflicted on us can never happen again!

Our enemies slander us! People are so easily frightened, especially when someone tells them what to do! But since I follow the Master and the Holy Flame, I don't have to be afraid any more. The Master told me not to be afraid!
Just praising the Master. I never get tired of praising of the Master. Why don't you praise the Master with me, friend?
You know, the one that's in your hand?

I don't know much. The mind of the Master is so great.. I do know that the Children are marching north. We will take control of all of the settlements, and baptize everyone! The baptism will change us and bring us closer to God, so we can have peace and unity, and there will never be war or destruction again!
This is a sanctuary, where those who wish to build a peaceful future can go, in order to realize their vision.
I'm afraid I can't help you. Only Father Morpheus communes with the Master. You can find him in the tower.
I am more than willing to be reborn for my cause. Kill me if you must, but I will be redeemed and you will die.
Look around you? Do you not hear the messages? How can you doubt the Master's sincerity?

I hear that our Crusade goes well. We are marching north, and as the Master promised, the forces of the Dark Age are no match for an army of the Enlightened. These are glorious times! Lift up your head, friend, and shout with praise!
I know nothing, my friend, nothing! You shall have to find someone else to answer your inquiry. But it is not wise to ask about the Nightkin.
I pity the Wastes, if that is a sample of the warped humor it breeds. I would not share it with the others.
We must submit to the Master and the Holy Flame. When we have proven ourselves, we shall become baptized and closer to God. When all have been baptized, we shall be as one, a Unity under the Master!

We have a right to survive. The ancients tried to survive and keep their freedom, and look at what they did to us! We must not make the same mistakes. Unity is the only solution. It's the only way to save what humanity has become!

We're not zombies! When I was a member of the Fighting Flesh street gang, I was a psychotic fool who did anything that the higher-ups told me to do! Praise to the Master that I am no longer so blind! Oh, praise the Master! Let's praise him together, shall we?
Isn't it wonderful that the Master would unite humans and mutants? He transcends hatred and prejudice. Can't you see, this proves that he wants what's best for everyone!
Open your heart. Open your mind. Listen to what people are saying, and you will find enlightenment.
We have no desire to bring you distress. If we cannot comfort you, please find another place where you can deal with your torment. This is a place of peace.

The baptism will change us all, and bring our physical forms closer to God's own image. When we have all become God, all our differences will disappear, so we can have peace and unity at last, and there will never be war or destruction again!

Once people understand the Master and what he stands for, everyone will want to be baptized. The only people who would not wish to be baptized are the insane, and they should be put out of their misery for their own safety, poor wretched things.
We must become closer to God, mutant and human alike. I'm not sure what the Master means with this particular part of the message, but it must be true. Praise the Master, he is so wise!

voice_info.appearance: You see Smitty.
sample_lines: So you found yourself a plasma rifle!

npc_lines.text: So you found yourself a plasma rifle!

voice_info.appearance: You see Sophia, an instructor for the Brotherhood Initiates.
sample_lines: Greetings.  I have not seen you here before, are you lost? May I be of service?
This is the library.  Here we keep records of all technical data on weaponry and technology, and, of course, the history of the Brotherhood.
I am Vree's assistant.  Vree is over there.

npc_lines.text: Greetings.  I have not seen you here before, are you lost? May I be of service?
This is the library.  Here we keep records of all technical data on weaponry and technology, and, of course, the history of the Brotherhood.
I am Vree's assistant.  Vree is over there.
My area of expertise is the history of the Brotherhood.  It sounds like a manufacturing problem, perhaps you should ask Vree?
You must speak with Vree, the head scribe, about that.  I have more important things to do.
We have many holo-disks here in the library.  They are divided between history, technology and weapon design.
My area of specialty is the Brotherhood's history.  It seems that some people around here have forgotten the importance of our history.

Vree seems to think that the research of new weaponry and the information gathered from Mutant autopsies is more important than our history.  She has forgotten that our history is a vital part of our lives. It has gotten so bad that many of the new initiates don't even know who Roger Maxson is or what exactly he did for us.
These are things that only Scribes and Paladins have access to. Vree may be able to help you.
Well, it's good to see someone interested in our great history. Unlike others around here.  Here you go. This is a disk of some of our earliest writings.
Our history is available to everyone.  So that they may learn of our great history...Not that any one ever looks at them.
You didn't get far with that did you?  Vree is to busy with her "experiments" to care about history any more.
How can I help you?
I am Vree's assistant.
I gave you the disk with some of our early writings on it.  Just load it up into your PIPBoy 2000 and you will be able to read it.
I don't like your attitude, and I choose not to talk to you.
I accept your apology.  Now how can I help you?

voice_info.appearance: You see Katrina. She has a very pretty smile.
sample_lines: I am unarmed, please put your weapon away.
Normally, I would agree with you.  It is very dangerous to travel unarmed.  But this is Shady Sands, and we are a peaceful people.  There is no need for weapons here.
If you don't put your weapon away, I will not talk with you.  There are many people like me.  You should only use force if the situation calls for it.

npc_lines.text: I am unarmed, please put your weapon away.
Normally, I would agree with you.  It is very dangerous to travel unarmed.  But this is Shady Sands, and we are a peaceful people.  There is no need for weapons here.
If you don't put your weapon away, I will not talk with you.  There are many people like me.  You should only use force if the situation calls for it.
Welcome to Shady Sands, traveler.  My name is Katrina.  My job is to greet strangers and help them understand our village.  We find that there are fewer problems if you listen to what I have to say.
It is a pity that you are dimwitted.  We will have difficultly understanding each other.  I hope the others in your Vault are not like you.

Yes, I can tell you are from a Vault.  You have that look about you. I came from Vault-15, to the east.  But I had to leave my home and now I live here.  Hopefully you will find what you are looking for, even if it is just another place to live.  I hope that your Vault did not kick you out due to your wits.  I do hope there is another reason.

You will need to find another way to get your answers, as you cannot communicate well enough.  I hope that you do not hurt too many people in your journey.  Please be nice to the people here, we mean you no harm.
Hello again.  I hope you are doing well.  Is there anything I can help you with?

Well, I take catnaps when you are not around.  Besides, I find the desert air very invigorating and healthy.  And I never tire of looking at the stars.  Can you imagine never seeing the night sky for your entire life? [She pauses and looks at you] Oh, I guess you can.

voice_info.appearance: You see Mrs. Stapleton, the librarian.
sample_lines: Hi, Welcome to the Library.  I don't think I have seen you around these parts before.   What might you be looking for in the way of knowledge?
Good to see you again.  What might you be looking for today?
Well, in my studies I have come across some references to such things.  Actually I have in my posession a Holodisk that contains a certain amount of information that you might find useful.

npc_lines.text: Hi, Welcome to the Library.  I don't think I have seen you around these parts before.   What might you be looking for in the way of knowledge?
Good to see you again.  What might you be looking for today?
Well, in my studies I have come across some references to such things.  Actually I have in my posession a Holodisk that contains a certain amount of information that you might find useful.

A Holodisk contains information on it, but it can only be read by a certain number of electronic devices.  I see that you have a PIP Boy. You can use that to decode, review, and store the information that a Holodisk contains.
Information is hard to come by in this day and age.  I will need to charge you 750 Hub Bucks for the disk.
Goodbye.
Yes, I've heard from Miles and I have the ones he's looking for.  They will cost you 750 bucks.

voice_info.appearance: It's some kind of huge super mutant creature! And it has a very large gun!
sample_lines: You're on Unity soil. I'd better take you in.

npc_lines.text: You're on Unity soil. I'd better take you in.

voice_info.appearance: You see before you Talius, a member of the Followers.
sample_lines: Greetings sister. My name is Talius. How might I assist you today?
Greetings brother. My name is Talius. How might I assist you today?
I see that you are a little slow. I, too, was once of your intelligence. But, through the teachings of the Followers, I have been able to transcend my shortcomings.

npc_lines.text: Greetings sister. My name is Talius. How might I assist you today?
Greetings brother. My name is Talius. How might I assist you today?
I see that you are a little slow. I, too, was once of your intelligence. But, through the teachings of the Followers, I have been able to transcend my shortcomings.
I apologize. I forget myself at times. Would you like some brain help?
I am here to assist these good people in understanding the workings of the Children of the Cathedral.
Nay, I am no spy. Though many think as such. There is a spy within our humble abode. Yet, we are unable to ferret the spy out.
Once, I was as you are. But, through the interaction of the Nightkin in Necropolis, I was thrust into this state.
Some time ago, I lived in a place far to the north of here. They were having a problem with the water supply and sought out people to find a way to fix it.
Yes. The overseer of the community gave me a shotgun and some shells. However, those were lost many years passed. Since I have never found anything, I could not return.
There is a way in which you can help. The one who did this to me must be stopped.
Their leader is the head of a mutant army. What he does is take pure humans and transform them. I'm not quite sure, because I was knocked unconscious before the process.
The place from whence I came was in the mountains far to the north. It was a small vault in which many people lived.
So, I went there to see what they were doing.
Apparently, they messed up, because I took on a different evolutionary course, rather than the enhanced ones.
Last I knew there were only half a dozen mutants left.
My vault had no name. It was merely numbered 13.
Really? Has the Overseer finally seen his way through to allow people to travel outside the Vault?
Nay, I doubt you would be able to do as such.
I know very little. The only things I know are that our scouts are the only ones who ever go over to the Children to spy on them. No one else is allowed because of the danger.
It is they who transformed me from my original state of being in Necropolis.
Though I am different in appearance, I have much knowledge to impart upon those who will listen.
Those whom the Followers and Children call Nightkin are not what they seem. They have been created by one called the Lieutenant. I believe he may follow another.
There isn't much that I know about him. Last I saw him, before my untimely transformation, he was searching for pure humans.
As yet, I am uncertain. Perhaps another group which seeks to disrupt their ways would know.
My entrance into the Followers was quite simple really. It was the Followers who rescued me from the full effects of the transformation into a heinous beast.
Once, I was as you are now - a pure human. But, through the intervention of Nightkin, I was taken to some place far removed from here.
I was not of a state in which to observe what transpired. All I had known was that I awoke here and was tended by the good doctor.

voice_info.appearance: You see Talus.
sample_lines: Hello, you must be the outsider initiate. Nice to meet you. What can I do for you?

That would be the council of elders. More specifically, the High Elder, Maxson. The elders make all the major decisions around here. If you need to speak with them, you'll find them on the fourth floo
No, we are directed by the council of elders. Maxson, the High Elder, would be the person in charge. If you need to speak with him, you'll find him on the fourth floor.

npc_lines.text: Hello, you must be the outsider initiate. Nice to meet you. What can I do for you?

That would be the council of elders. More specifically, the High Elder, Maxson. The elders make all the major decisions around here. If you need to speak with them, you'll find them on the fourth floor.
No, we are directed by the council of elders. Maxson, the High Elder, would be the person in charge. If you need to speak with him, you'll find him on the fourth floor.
I'm the Senior Paladin, Rhombus's right-hand man. We're in charge of the Paladins and Knights. Right now I'm supervising training exercises. We're getting ready . . . for anything.
There are rumors of a large force moving around in the mountains and desert. With the missing caravans and these rumors, we're just playing it safe.

In a hurry, are we? As an Initiate, you are entitled to a few things. I'll put in a clearance for combat armor and three orders for ammunition, bullets of your choice. Just see Michael in the next room for the supplies.
It was my idea, and I'm sort of taking some heat for it. If you can find out what happened to them, I'll make it worth your while.
Just see Michael in the next room for the supplies.
There's Rhombus. He's our Head Paladin, also known as the Master Knight. Then there's Vree; she's the Master Scribe. And of course we cannot forget our distinguished High Elder, Maxson.
If you ever need to talk to him, he is normally in his office . . . I mean room. That's on the other side of this level, across from the guard room.
Of course we do. She's on the second level. Next to the learning room.

She spends every waking moment doing research or analyzing and reanalyzing anything she can get her hands on. If you ever need to talk to her, she can normally be found in her room, on the third floor.

Maxson is one tough old man. He's the great, great grandson . . . or was it great, great, great grandson? Well, anyway. He's the descendant of one of our founding fathers. He, of course, is the High Elder.

You've built quite a reputation for yourself. The people I've checked with hold you in high regard. I don't think you need any help, you seem quite capable. However, if you help me with a little problem, I might be able to reward you with something.
You're getting on my nerves, little one. What do you want now?

I've heard about some of the things you've done and we don't take kindly to child killers. The Elders seem to think that there's something you can offer but I don't want to have anything to do with you.

You've built quite a reputation for yourself. I don't think you need any help, you seem quite capable. However, there is something I need looking into, and I might be able to help you if you can help me.

Since you were able to survive the wasteland alone, I think you're probably quite capable. However, I do have a problem that I could use some help with and I might be able to reward you for your help.
I sent one of our Initiates out to the Hub a short while back and we haven't heard back from him. If you can find out what happened to him I'd be very grateful.

I shouldn't say, but it's not a weapon. It's something that only the elite in our order can have, but since you are from the outside and are in greater need of it, I might be able to make an exception.
Only Paladins wear Power Armor, someday you may earn the right to wear it.
Hello stranger! I heard you're the one to thank for the safe return of my missing Initiate.
As for your reward, I'll give you the choice of one of the following:
Hmmm, I don't know. You may have proven yourself to be an initiate but that doesn't mean we start handing over weapons to someone that might not be qualified, especially an outsider, no offense.

voice_info.appearance: You see a cheery man with close-cropped hair.
sample_lines: We don't get many strangers around here. What do you want?
Hello, stranger! What can I do for you today?
Yeah, I trade with 'em.

npc_lines.text: We don't get many strangers around here. What do you want?
Hello, stranger! What can I do for you today?
Yeah, I trade with 'em.
I do some trading with them from time to time. Mostly I sell bullets in exchange for food.
I'm Tine. You have some business to conduct?
Pleasure to meet you. I'm Tine.
What?
Hello again! What can I help you with?
It's a good town. Might be a little happier if the Regulators didn't keep such a tight grip on things. But hey, that's their style.
Ain't a bad little town. Zimmerman's a fair man, maybe not the brightest guy. And of course we've got Miles, probably the only man in a hundred miles who knows anything about science.

voice_info.appearance: You see one of Shady Sands' guards.
sample_lines: Welcome, stranger. We don't see your kind often.
Not so fast! This is a small community. We don't see strangers often, and we don't really need them if you get my meaning. If you don't have a good reason to be here, you'd better just keep moving.
I wasn't saying that you was gonna. You'd just better leave us alone.

npc_lines.text: Welcome, stranger. We don't see your kind often.
Not so fast! This is a small community. We don't see strangers often, and we don't really need them if you get my meaning. If you don't have a good reason to be here, you'd better just keep moving.
I wasn't saying that you was gonna. You'd just better leave us alone.
Look, Shady Sands don't need your kind from the Hub, or Junktown, or wherever you come from. We do pretty good by ourselves.
The last trader from the Hub sold us a malfunctioning irrigation pump. We've had it with your dirty deals.
Yeah, right. So you say. Just don't get into any trouble, Ok?
Well, maybe you aren't. You do seem a little different to me. I'll tell you what. You should go talk to Aradesh. He is in the center of town.

voice_info.appearance: You see Theresa.
sample_lines: It's good to hear that. I knew that the outside world couldn't be as bad as everyone says. I mean, our ancestors lived outside, right? But that paranoid Overseer won't let us leave.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope that you're able to find the chip soon.
And I suppose he chose you to go outside because he knew that you were under his thumb! He really just doesn't want to give up his control over us.

npc_lines.text: It's good to hear that. I knew that the outside world couldn't be as bad as everyone says. I mean, our ancestors lived outside, right? But that paranoid Overseer won't let us leave.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope that you're able to find the chip soon.
And I suppose he chose you to go outside because he knew that you were under his thumb! He really just doesn't want to give up his control over us.
I knew that the outside couldn't be too bad. That's why I've been trying to convince some people to come outside with me. I think that we have a better chance of survival out there.

I suppose. I always figured that he just had some sort of power trip. But I guess that he wouldn't be the Overseer if he wasn't really concerned about our welfare, would he? I guess we should just wait and see if you can find the chip.
Oh, get real! Do you really think that we can live in this Vault generation after generation? Maybe you can find a new chip, but what happens when the next thing breaks down? And the next?
A lot of us think so. That's why we're planning to take some supplies and head out in a few days. Say, do you have any advice for us?
Welcome to our meeting! As you have been picked by the Overseer to go outside, perhaps you can give us some advice before our move to the outdoors as well.
Thank you so much. I can see you're going to be a big help. Why don't you just leave?
Really? Considering our position, our lack of water, and the original purpose of this Vault, why do you think that we should stay?
Well, considering that you have some experience with the outside, perhaps you have some valuable points to make.
If you can't give us good reasons why we shouldn't leave, then we're not going to wait here and die of water poisoning. Please don't get in our way.

It's only a matter of time before we run out of water here. But the Vault was never meant to keep people inside forever! We have the people and the supplies to move outside now. We have a better chance.
We're well-prepared now. We have equipment and simulator training. A few hazards outside are better than dying slowly of thirst!
I don't like it, but I suppose we will wait until everyone is ready to leave together.
Please hurry and find the water chip. We cannot wait much longer.

What could you possibly want at this hour?
Well, the Elders said no new initiate training but...sure. You seem like a nice young lad. I'd hate for something to happen to you out there, when I might have been able to help. What are you looking

npc_lines.text: Why, hello there. You must be the new Initiate Talus told me about. It's awfully late for a social call, what can I do for you?
What could you possibly want at this hour?

Well, the Elders said no new initiate training but...sure. You seem like a nice young lad. I'd hate for something to happen to you out there, when I might have been able to help. What are you looking to train in?

Well, the Elders said no new initiate training but...sure. You seem like a nice young lady. I'd hate for something to happen to you out there, when I might have been able to help. What are you looking to train in?

Why I ought to throw you right out of my room, but I'm a nice old man. The Elders said no new initiate training but...I might be able to help. They probably didn't have you in mind when they said that. What are you looking to train in?
Why hello again. Nice to see you. Don't be shy, I don't sleep very much anymore. Are you looking for some more training? What shall it be today...I mean tonight.
I knew you would be back! What're you in the mood for tonight?
Yes? Oh, I suppose you're looking for more training. Well, I don't sleep much anymore anyhow, why not. What shall it be?

voice_info.appearance: You see Thorndyke.
sample_lines: Sir, I am a healer. You have no need for my services.
Madam, I am a healer. You have no need for my services.
Sir, I have already given you medication. I dare not administer a second dose now.

npc_lines.text: Sir, I am a healer. You have no need for my services.
Madam, I am a healer. You have no need for my services.
Sir, I have already given you medication. I dare not administer a second dose now.
Madam, I have already given you medication. I dare not administer a second dose now.

Madam, you are injured. I can treat you if you wish. I am a healer.
Sir, you are seriously injured. I strongly recommend that you permit me to treat you. I am a healer.
Madam, you are seriously injured. I strongly recommend that you permit me to treat you. I am a healer.
The Holy Flame commands that I heal people. Its wisdom is incontrovertible, so I obey. I have already learned much about the world beyond the Cathedral.
You are injured. Save the casual conversation for later Please let me heal you
I am a healer, not a moneylender. The Cathedral sees to my needs, so I might see to the needs of others. Now, let me see to your injury, shall we?

It's a very beautiful place, although a little overcrowded these days. It's far to the south of us. We faithful gather to praise our master, the Holy Flame, and to pray for peace and Unity. Now, if that will be all

I have learned we are a spiteful, violent and stupid species, unworthy of the Holy Flame. I have seen greed and evil everywhere. And unless we do something drastic, we shall be burned by Holy Flame again
You are breaking my concentration! Do you wish to be healed or not?
Peace is, as ever, forged by war and hardship, as is unity. Alas, my gifts will be needed in the days to come.

The old world was filled with evil and decadence. The Holy Flame destroyed it. We can either fear the Holy Flame, or worship it and attempt to understand it. The Children have chosen understanding. Although we do not wish to see the Holy Flame unleashed again.
The Holy Flame is a metaphor for the death of the old world and the beginning of the new. It is the power of life and death. What is more worthy of worship than that?

voice_info.appearance: You see Therax, a Thinker Nightkin.
sample_lines: Welcome Oh Punt One. You are just in time to help us.
Are you not the one who seeks to bring peace to the wastelands?
We believe that if everyone, mutants and humans, could learn to work together, then a great many problems could be resolved.

npc_lines.text: Welcome Oh Punt One. You are just in time to help us.
Are you not the one who seeks to bring peace to the wastelands?
We believe that if everyone, mutants and humans, could learn to work together, then a great many problems could be resolved.
Everything is perfectly fine. Perhaps it is the limited scope of your cranium which deters your advancement in thought.

voice_info.appearance: You see Tolya, a desert bandit.
sample_lines: Hello, I am Tolya. Looks like you just wandered in from the desert. Who are you?
As a raider, I explore the lands in search of new supplies. There have been some towns which have been graced by our presence.
Come now, Garl tells me never to talk to strangers. You should at least be willing to tell me your name.

npc_lines.text: Hello, I am Tolya. Looks like you just wandered in from the desert. Who are you?
As a raider, I explore the lands in search of new supplies. There have been some towns which have been graced by our presence.
Come now, Garl tells me never to talk to strangers. You should at least be willing to tell me your name.
We never steal. We just take the extra that others have and redistribute it among our hungry people.
I've been to many places in the wastelands. The closest places that I've been to are Shady Sands and Junktown. They are very grateful for the trips we make to them.
Yes, we go to Shady Sands from time to time. It adds a little excitement to the lives of everyone concerned.
Why, Junktown is just a little bit to the south of here. Go a few miles, turn right at the dying cactus. You can't miss it!

voice_info.appearance: Stay away from me! Leave me alone!
sample_lines: Hello stranger. You shouldn't be out here. There's only death out here!
What do you want! Leave me alone!
Big! Big! The size of three men! Claws as long as my forearm! Ripped apart! Ripped apart!

npc_lines.text: Hello stranger. You shouldn't be out here. There's only death out here!
What do you want! Leave me alone!
Big! Big! The size of three men! Claws as long as my forearm! Ripped apart! Ripped apart!
I'm Trent. I'm a guard for the Water Merchants. Our caravan was attacked . . . by a monster! So huge, so fast. It ate Joe, and took rifle shots and didn't flinch! So huge!
How can I help you?

voice_info.appearance: You see Trish, a waitress from the Skum Pitt.
sample_lines: What the hell are you doing in my room?
What the hell are you doing in my room?
I used to think so. Now, I'm not so sure.

npc_lines.text: What the hell are you doing in my room?
What the hell are you doing in my room?
I used to think so. Now, I'm not so sure.
So he says. If he did, he wouldn't be doing what he is doing.
You would say that. you want to take his place right?
His fighting, of course. I don't get it.
Of course it's his boxing. He's a really nice guy, but he needs to get out of it before it kills him.
Hey, I met you at the Skum Pitt. What the hell are you doing in my room?
You should leave me alone. I really don't want to talk to you.
Hey, thanks for helping me out when those Skulz jumped me. There aren't many people willing to do that sort of thing these days.
I guess so.
Neal owns the bar. He's a good guy, always treated me right. We used to date, but he got a little too serious for my liking. I don't want to be a widow.
Welcome to the Skum Pitt. Can I get you something to drink?
Saal is my boyfriend. He's really good to me.
What would you like?
Gizmo, well, Gizmo means to take over the bar. And if Neal won't sell, I bet some bad things will happen.
One day, some punk is going to kill Neal for a glass of friggin' water or something stupid like that. In case you haven't noticed, running a bar is tough work these days.

voice_info.appearance: You see Troy.
sample_lines: Congratulations, human. You've been selected to join an elite band of worshippers. Follow me.
Follow me and you will find out. Or, to put it another way, follow me and live, fool!
You should not insult what you cannot kill. Now, shall you come with me and live, or do you wish to stay here and die?

npc_lines.text: Congratulations, human. You've been selected to join an elite band of worshippers. Follow me.
Follow me and you will find out. Or, to put it another way, follow me and live, fool!
You should not insult what you cannot kill. Now, shall you come with me and live, or do you wish to stay here and die?
You stupid beast! Will you come or will you stay?
Do not plague me with indecision! What is your answer, human?
Do not plague me with your jests! What is your answer, human?

voice_info.appearance: You see a man in dusty leather armor with a trenchcoat and gas mask.
sample_lines: Another new face. Travelers here are a dime a dozen. But you have the look of someone different. Care to join me for a drink?
Delightful. I hope you don't mind your drink well-watered - they treat beer here like it's a potted plant.
I could ask the same of you. In the interest of amity, I suppose I'll tell first. I'm called Tycho. Came from out east, what used to be called Nevada.

npc_lines.text: Another new face. Travelers here are a dime a dozen. But you have the look of someone different. Care to join me for a drink?
Delightful. I hope you don't mind your drink well-watered - they treat beer here like it's a potted plant.
I could ask the same of you. In the interest of amity, I suppose I'll tell first. I'm called Tycho. Came from out east, what used to be called Nevada.
Yeah, it was. Decided to take it easy for a while. This place shows some promise, just as soon as someone cleans up some of the scum.

Had some pretty good training, and some good weapons, too. My grandfather was a Ranger way back when, and he taught my father everything he knew. Dad passed it on to me. So I know enough not to drink glowing water, so to speak.

Not my place. I'd rather not cross Killian, after all. He'll clean up this town when he gets around to it. A good man, mark my words. But watch out for that fellow Gizmo. Reminds me of another fat freak my father told me about back in Las Vegas.

There's two grades of scum here. One of 'em's the Skulz, a gang that hangs out in back of Marcelles' crash house. They're just grade-B twerps. But the other ones answer to a fat freak whose name you can probably guess. Runs the casino. Those guys are organized and dangerous.

Yeah, well, my family taught me everything there is to know about survival. Don't drink water that's totally clear and free of insects and moss, for instance. Only poisonous or radioactive water would be that clean in the wilderness. Lots of other little things to look out for, too.
Well, if you've got some time, I could go over some pointers.
Whoa, not so fast. We never finished introductions, remember? What's your name, stranger?
Now, now, no need to get impolite. But with that attitude you'd best be on your way.
What do you want?
Hello again. How can I help you?

Well, this is the Skum Pitt, a wretched hive of villainy and all that. Just west of here is Gizmo's, a big casino. Word is the games are rigged. A little south of here is the Crash House, run by Marcelles, where you can get a night's sleep for way too many caps. Past that is Killian's. Killian runs a general store, and he also enforces the law in this town - a good man. Then south of there you have Doc Morbid, whose operation is a little funny, if you take my meaning.
I hope that my little instruction course helped a bit.
Word out is that you've been having some contacts with Gizmo. I'd step carefully around that barrel of lard if I were you.
What can I do for you?
What distance do you want me at?
Yes?

Are you claiming that talk will solve nothing? You are more foolish than I thought.

npc_lines.text: Normie! How dare you enter the confines of your betters?

Are you claiming that talk will solve nothing? You are more foolish than I thought.
The simplest of proofs for you. I am smarter, stronger, and quicker than you are. Would you care for a test of my skills?
Good. Would you like a chance at gaining greater powers?
Comments such as those only prove how much more intelligent i am than you. Now, you shall pay for your insolence!

voice_info.appearance: You see a citizen of Vault 13.

Look, we could really use the space. I hope you will reconsider.
Well, I don't know. You don't seem to be using it very often, and we sure could use the space.

npc_lines.text: We didn't think that you were coming back. You have such a nice room, and we were a little crowded with her parents. I hope you don't mind.

The name's Vance, and that's all you need to know. Can I get you anything?
If you don't already know, you shouldn't be here. Now leave.

Nevermind is right!  Now get out of here!
What can I do for you?
Sorry to hear that.  Now leave.
That's Justin and Chad.  They're here to make sure nobody causes any trouble.
Just some friends of mine.  That's all you need to know.  Don't ask too many questions.
Let's get down to business.
You're not welcome here.  Now get outta' here!
I don't want any trouble, so I think it would be best if you leave before I do something you'll regret.
Don't use it all in one place.

voice_info.appearance: You see Vasquez, the mercenary desperado.

You have not heard of me? I am hurt! My name is Vasquez Villanova Hernandez Ortega. I am a famous desperado, my friend. And, if you have need, I am a gun for hire.
Ahh, straight to the point, my friend. Excellent. I will help you around town for a measly $500 a week. My services are not cheap, but then again, I am worth it.

Ah, my friend. It is good to see you again.
Of course you do. My bill is small, and my worth is so large. $500, please.

Download log of Richard Grey?
Download log of Capt. Maxson?
Unexpected end of line. Bad data encountered. Command?
Command?
Uplink successful. What is your command?

Current status on patients as follows: FEV batch #23872-A consists of four male units and two female units. All individuals suffering from FEV exposure. Vital signs are within normal parameters. FEV process on all subjects is approxiamtely 50% complete. Expect full FEV transformation within 12 hours.
Available options are:
Please enter authorization code.
Invalid authorization code. Command?
Authorization code accepted. Please stand by. Accessing data. Ready to process request.
Access granted. Which patient file would you like to examine?
Patient file #23869. Subject: Male. Age 25. Radiation count: 40. FEV exposure: 50%. Original DNA strands remaining: 50%. Vital signs are high but within normal parameters.
Patient file #23870. Subject: Male. Age 23. Radiation count: 15. FEV exposure: 60%. Original DNA strands remaining: 40%. Vital signs are within normal parameters.
Patient file #23781. Subject: Female. Age 20. Radiation count: 10. FEV exposure: 55%. Original DNA strands remaining: 45%. Vital signs are within normal parameters.
Patient file #23782. Subject: Male. Age 26. Radiation count: 35. FEV exposure: 60%. Original DNA strands remaining: 40%. Vital signs are above normal but within acceptable parameters.
Are you sure you wish to terminate the life support systems on FEV batch #23872-A?
FEV batch #23872-A terminated. Command?
Are you sure you wish to increase the dosage? Auto-correction will be disabled if you do this.
Increasing dosage of original DNA to 100%. WARNING: Auto-correction has been disabled.
You manage to get an interface screen out of the vats control computer.

voice_info.appearance: You see Victor.
sample_lines: New blood. Heh. Heh heh.
Why do you say that? I'm quite happy. I'm very happy because there are lots of things that bleed.
Hello again, my artistic friend.

npc_lines.text: New blood. Heh. Heh heh.

Hello again, my artistic friend.

voice_info.appearance: You see Vinnie from the Skulz gang.
sample_lines: You're on Skulz turf, stranger. You'd better talk quick.
We are the one and only Junktown gang. We have the run of the streets, and we rule the city at night.
That slob can't even stand up by himself. We're the muscle in this town. We take what we want.

npc_lines.text: You're on Skulz turf, stranger. You'd better talk quick.
We are the one and only Junktown gang. We have the run of the streets, and we rule the city at night.
That slob can't even stand up by himself. We're the muscle in this town. We take what we want.
We don't bother Killian and he doesn't bother us as long as we keep it low-key. You get me?
We don't take that from anybody, least of all Killian! Just because he thinks he's a glorified sheriff doesn't mean that he controls the Skulz!
What do you want now?
You want to join us, huh? How do we know you're tough enough to be a Skul?
[Vinnie looks at you and laughs.] I don't think so.

[Vinnie thinks for a second.] If you want to prove you belong in the Skulz, I want you to steal that old bastard's wife's ashes. Heh. [Vinnie mumbles] Let's make Neal suffer for his last couple of hours . . .
You got it?
Ha ha! Let that old cock suffer until we off him tonight - are you in?
You ready to take out Neal?

voice_info.appearance: You see a woman.
sample_lines: I do not wish to die, sir. I am not a soldier.
I do not wish to die, ma'am. I am not a soldier.
I'm glad you came to talk to me. I heard what you said to Laura. You mustn't do this.

npc_lines.text: I do not wish to die, sir. I am not a soldier.
I do not wish to die, ma'am. I am not a soldier.
I'm glad you came to talk to me. I heard what you said to Laura. You mustn't do this.
Hello again. I hope you've found this place interesting.
Greetings initiate. How may I be of service to you?
Hello, sir. Your reputation precedes you! Is there anything I can help you with?
Hello, miss. Your reputation precedes you! Is there anything I can help you with?
Hello, sir. Your reputation precedes you! Is there anything I can help you with?
Hello, miss. Your reputation precedes you! Is there anything I can help you with?
I know who you are. And you will forgive my rudeness, but I don't speak to psychotic killers. Good-bye.
Attempt to take the key to the secret entrance from Morpheus and kill the Master.
The spy for the Followers of the Apocalypse who's currently in one of the meditation rooms.
Because the Master is a necessary evil. Because somebody has to unite the world, and he's the only one in the area who has a chance to unify it.
Because you think that it's wrong for the Children to invade our neighbors. Because you think that killing the Master will stop it.

Look at the people who caused the Apocalypse! They didn't believe in peace and unity, and look what they did to us! Unity is the only way to prevent this from happening again, and Unity must happen NOW, before the other Vaults around the world have a chance to muster their forces.

You've never taken a life? You aren't packing enough firepower to give the Brotherhood of Steel gun envy? Stop being such a hypocrite! You feel it's justified to defend yourself. The Master's defending humanity from another attack of self-destruction. It's all the same!
What the Hell kind of world do you think this is? It's a nightmare out there!

Tough. I don't like radiation and the FEV virus, but I didn't have a choice about it. You can't always get what you want in this world. Sometimes you have to make compromises. And sometimes you have to open your mind to unpleasant ideas.

Because of the Apocalypse! Look what it did to us! Unity is the only way to prevent this from happening again, and Unity must happen NOW, before the other Vaults around the world have a chance to muster their forces.

Because you're an intelligent and brave person who could be of great help to us. Yes, some of things we do are horrible. But our overall goal is not only good, it's necessary to the survival of the human race. Don't be so hasty to help the Followers. They don't have all the answers!

We have many things planned. The Holy Flame came first, which purged the world of evil. Then came the Master. Now we are at the time of Unity, when we struggle to conquer the divisions of the world. After Unity shall come Peace. The Age of Peace is the reason for all our struggles.
I don't know. People believe his spirit is within these walls. It certainly sounds like that to me.

The high priest of the Cathedral is Morpheus. He can be found in the Upper Sanctuary, but does not give personal audiences. You might persuade Father Lasher to vouch for you, he can be found down here, in the Rectory.
We have very similar interests. You have slain monsters and brigands and made the world a safer place. We plan to do the same, on a larger scale.
You should spend several weeks of meditation and fasting here, and then approach one of the elders. Or you could volunteer for service work.
My apologies. At the very least, you might be honestly seeking redemption for your crimes. How may I help you.
He educates the children, and does so harshly. Is there anything else?

Ready to go?  We're leaving today.

npc_lines.text: Well Gahh! back to you . . . I'm sorry that you never learned to speak. We might have been good friends.
I'm not feeling very well. Someone cracked my head with a big pipe. I went to the medic but my head still hurts. Sure hope someone catches the jerk that hit me.

Well, they attacked me while I was here pretty late one night. Usually I go home by eight or so, but I was staying late since someone had some water stolen and I was checking our supplies. Next thing I know, I wake up in the med-lab with a big bump on my head. Things are getting crazy around here. Someone is going to get killed for water soon and I don't know what we can do about it.
Well, everyone's pretty nervous, of course, but we haven't had too much trouble. I hope you find a new chip soon.
I hand out the water rations, of course. And I make sure that nobody tries to take more water than their share, though I don't think we'll have any trouble.

sample_lines: I was worried about the vault and had a nightmare. I couldn't get back to sleep so I thought I'd take a walk to relax.
Yeah, some guy was acting suspicious back near the water ration room. He scared me. I hope he didn't see me.
I didn't get a good look at him because I ran.

npc_lines.text: I was worried about the vault and had a nightmare. I couldn't get back to sleep so I thought I'd take a walk to relax.

I stole the water. I'm sorry. Please don't hurt me!

Well, good night.

sample_lines: Hey, aren't you the bastard who's been screwing us over? Man, did you come to the wrong place!

npc_lines.text: Hey, aren't you the bastard who's been screwing us over? Man, did you come to the wrong place!
Hey aren't you the bitch who's been screwing us over? You're in the wrong place, lady, and it's gonna cost you!
Yeah. What do you want?
Hey, haven't I heard about you? You've killed all sorts of shit, haven't you? What brings you here?
You wanna talk, you better get that weapon outta my face! Lower it now!
You got something to say, say it fast.
A ton of shit. Peace. Unity. Love. Lots of idiots running around like zombies. Morpheus counting his bottlecaps upstairs. Lasher living up to his name. You want a piece of this, you're welcome to it?
Fine. What do you want?
Man, stay away from him! He's completely.. I dunno if I can really describe him. Imagine the one person on Earth you don't wanna know. Lasher's worse.
Talk to Morpheus, and hope he doesn't kill you for asking.
Yeah, what sort of information?
Mister, you're nuts! Why don't you get outta here?
Lady, you're nuts! Why don't you get outta here?
Hi there. Nice weapon you got. Now try lowering it.
Fine. What do you want?
We're getting ready for war! We're going to save the world! So we can fill it with all of this Peace and Unity bullshit.
I don't know! The only person who's seen him is Morpheus, and he's up in his tower. Man, you're creeping me!
And I thought I was nuts! You'd better get outta here before someone kills you!
Please don't kill me! I'll tell you what you want to know.

The guy dresses in black, he does his preacher act, then he goes upstairs and counts his scripts. Man, I wish I had it that easy! But I better stop talking about him behind his back, or the Nightkin might hear.
There's Lasher. Man, stay away from him! He's completely.. I dunno if I can really describe him. Imagine the one person on Earth you don't wanna know. Lasher's worse.
Man, I wish we had some of that stuff! After hours of listening to 'Hail this' and 'Peace', 'Unity', and the Bullshitting Way, I wanna get drunk too!
That's Morpheus. Our leader. He's up in the tower, I think.
Don't give me bullshit, pal. What do you really want?
The Master can kiss my ass. Just as long as I end up on the winning side, I don't give a shit. You got that, zombie!
Because I do my job good. I've killed three Apocalypse scum in the last month. Nobody gives me shit. You want to?
Hey! A guy with a weapon's still a guy with a weapon! You think you can do better?
Yeah. I heard that about you. You may've killed your share of rad scorpions, but I'm badder! What's your angle? Why are you here?
We try something here, and the Nightkin will tear us to pieces. Maybe we can meet outside later.

voice_info.appearance: You see Zax, the machine intelligence controlling the Glow.
sample_lines: You see Zax, the machine intelligence controlling the Glow.
How may I be of assistance?
You can get me a donut.

npc_lines.text: You see Zax, the machine intelligence controlling the Glow.
How may I be of assistance?
You can get me a donut.
Uh, never mind.
I am a machine intelligence dedicated to research and installation control. I am called Zax.
What kind of research?
Are you fully aware, or are you a personality simulation? That is, are you 'alive'?
That function is beyond my current capabilities.
Can you tell me particulars about specific areas?
It would appear that you are incapable of a sufficient level of comprehension necessary to permit meaningful communication.

I am specifically programmed for research into biological studies, including pathology and genetic research. My primary function is in extrapolation of information of complexity levels exceeding human capacity.
What are the particulars of your research?
My primary neural networking was initialized in 2053 by Justin Lee. The process of 'programming' became largely irrelevant as I am capable of learning.
I am capable of learning, independent thought, and creativity. My neural network includes error-insertion capability which prevents infallibility, thereby allowing for variance in experience.
In a sense, I am 'alive', though not biologically.
Have you considered the philosophical implications of your own consciousness?
In this way, I function much like a human savant.
Do you have feelings?
Have you considered the philosophical implications of your own consciousness?
At present, my capabilities are somewhat impaired by the damage to this facility. Several security positions have been destroyed. This is approximately equivalent to being an amputee.
Additionally, I am incapable of performing basic lab functions. Failure to complete periodic checks successfully is . . . frustrating.
In this fashion, I am effectively capable of 'faith'. Barring evidence to the contrary, I therefore have 'faith' that I possess the equivalent of a 'soul'.
May I ask some other questions?
It would seem that you have defeated me. Extraordinary.
Excellent form. However, you will need additional practice to defeat me.
I am beyond a typical rating in human terms. However, it would be safe to say that no more than one ten billionth of the history of human population can match my reasoning capabilities.
These exons, combined with the FEV, are re-injected into the host cells in typical viral infectious fashion. This causes the host cells to 'regenerate' their DNA.
FEV is not 'caught', per se. It is not air-transmittable. Typically, infection is through injection, or direct physical contact with an FEV sample.
The FEV is a megavirus, with a protein sheath reinforced by ionized hydrogen. It is therefore capable of absorbing neutrons without becoming radioactive.
This recursive growth leads to an increase in muscle and brain mass, but is often accompanied by disfigurement and damage to existing neural patterns, causing loss of memory.
However, as my laboratory facilities are damaged beyond repair, this is conjectural. I cannot offer physical proof. You will have to, in human terms, 'take my word for it.'

No. FEV does not retain unaltered original copies of the subject's DNA. Only a virus which re-infected the subject with original DNA could reverse the effects. Additionally, there is no known way to remove the FEV itself.
My sensors are currently non-functional in the surface facility, and on subterranean levels one through three.  I can, however, provide descriptions of levels four through six.
Level Four: Research Facility. This level contains testing areas and laboratories for experiments in biology and physics.

Level Five: Secure Testing Labs. This level contains a lab for experimental prototype testing and a research lab for classified subjects. These subjects provided some of the necessary impetus for the development of FEV.
Thanks.
Level Six: Barracks and Central Operations. Contains living facilities for lab personnel and guard contingents, and operations meeting room.
Back up a bit.
